page.title: 18INTERESTING PEOPLE
page.content: IN UPLOWMAN THERE IS A MAN A CALLED MR PINSENT HE USED TO GO TO UPLOWMAN SCHOOL WHEN HE WENT TO SCHOOL THERE WERE NO ELECTRIC LIGHTS.THE DESKS WERE MADE OF IRON THEY HAD SLATES AND A SLATE PENCIL TO WRITE WITH.IN THE WINTER IT WAS VERY COLD AND THE INK WOULD FREEZE UP.ON THE TEACHERS DESK, THERE WOULD BE ALOT OF CANES SO THAT IF ONE BROKE ANOTHER COULD TAKE ITS PLACE.IF YOU WERE NAUGHTY YOU WOULD ALSO HAVE TO DO LINES.THE BOYS HAD CONTESTS TO SEE WHICH OF THEM COULD GROW THE BIGGEST BLOOMS IN THE SCHOOL GARDEN.THE GIRLS AND THE BOYS HAD SEPARATE DOORS.THE TEACHER LIVED IN THE HOUSE NEXT TO THE SCHOOL.THE BOYS WORE COBBLED BOOTS AND SHORTS.THERE WAS A BELL ON THE SCHOOL ROOF.THERE WERE SIX CLASSES GOING ON IN ONE ROOM.THEY HAD MILK AT BREAK AND PASTIES FOR DINNER.
